import React from 'react' import './AboutStyle.css' import me from '../img/me.png' import Button from '../Button/Button' import react from '../img/react.svg' import javascript from '../img/javascript.svg' import html5 from '../img/html5.svg' import css3 from '../img/css.svg' import sass from '../img/sass.svg' import bootstrap from '../img/bootstrap.svg' import node from '../img/nodejs.svg' const About = () => { return (

Who Am I?

I'm a non-binary human striving to combine my passions for aesthetics, code, and music.

I've been a freelance graphic designer for over 4 years creating logos, custom graphics, marketing content, and print work.

Programming has been a 2 year journey so far but I've learned how to create beautiful user experiences, leveraging tools like React, Node.js, Material UI, Bootstrap, and web basics like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Scroll down for a short summary of my previous work along with some of the new technologies and skills I've learned.

Skills

React

JavaScript

HTML5

CSS3

Sass

Bootstrap

Node.js

Node.js

Node.js

Work Experience
) } export default About
